: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw: The dart effect will wear off, but we'll speed it up in the CR.
SharpClaw takes KitKat to an CR chamber, placing her within it, and starting a heal cycle.
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Carnatron felt her frequency fading. He turned to Perceptor. He stared at him 
codly. "I'll have Hydras deal with you! Fighting amongst yourselves, your 
pathetic. When she wakes up I hope she kicks ur metallic ass." He walked over 
to Kit Kat. "This will help keep her stable until we get her into a CR 
chamber. He took a small piece of his black organism covering his body and 
placed it on Kit Kat. He gave it one instruction to keep her alive until the 
CR chamber fixed her. The suit to his knowledge would only willingly seperate 
from him when he willed it to. When the organism was placed on Kit Kat it 
would listen to her as well. If it changed her at all it would be diffrent 
then his change since he was a pure energon body when it attached to him. (If 
you want you can just have it die when she gets fixed or have it change her a 
little bit whatever floats your boat.)
> KitKat::
> 
> She was unconsious from the dart. Mech fluid leaking from the corner 
> of her mouth and her face plates damaged. Her body limp in 
> Perceptor's hands. Her optics flickered as her program tried to 
> restart despite the dart's sedative effects. Even out cold her 
> programs wouldn't give up. Yet, she remained unconsious. 
> 
> 
> 
>

>
